verbs.description: sorry [ARGM-DIS: liberals] [ARGM-DIS: but] [ARG1: america] [V: is] [ARGM-NEG: not] [ARG2: a democracy] and it better that way our republic is democratic in that it is controlled by public opinion but our constitution requires patience for the people to express that opinion us constitution trump abraham lincoln thomas perez united nations band presidential election supreme court of canada president trump james madison electoral college
